amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce administrative salaries in the expense accounts by 3%, with the exception of the Coast Guard, and to apply the savings of $498,099,270 to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for various accounts and apply the savings of $498,099,270 to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 273 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 273 (Roll no. 346).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
